snippet: Shining Path rebels kidnapped 30 workers at a natural gas field in southern Peru on Monday before letting most of them go hours later, officials said.
abstract: Gunmen believed to be Shining Path rebels kidnap seven Peruvian employees of the Swedish construction company Skanska, who were building a natural gas plant in the Amazon jungle.
lead_paragraph: Shining Path rebels kidnapped 30 workers at a natural gas field in southern Peru on Monday before letting most of them go hours later, officials said.

headline.main: Peru: Gunmen Abduct Workers at Gas Pipeline
headline.print_headline: Peru: Gunmen Abduct Workers at Gas Pipeline
